It's 0.90, 0.9 was before 0.10

Sorry guys. Looks like we're not getting it today or tomorrow.

Unless Maxmaps is being uber cryptic again and he's actually saying it's gonna release today.

The key thing here is today is not ruled out. There are two possibilities.

1. It comes out today, everyone is happy, this message is funny and everyone goes into the week with a new version of KSP to play.

2. It comes out AFTER tuesday. Everyone waits, but are somewhat annoyed that it still logically could of been choice number 1. Maxmaps got us with these two possibilities and some people are even annoyed at the fact that Max not only said its not tuesday, but it COULD of logically been monday.

In other words, its today, or Max is pulling our leg meanly :'(
